metadata.title: CVE-2019-16225 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in py-lmdb 0.97. For certain values of mp_flags, mdb_page_touch does not properly set up mc->mc_pg[mc->top], leading to an invalid write operation. NOTE: this outcome occurs when accessing a data.mdb file supplied by an attacker.

criterions.comment: py-lmdb package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
